methods.get:
Gets the row key value where key exists in the table, or the no-entry-value if it is not found in the table.

:param key: (java.lang.Object) - a single object for a single column, or a SmartKey for
        multiple columns
:return: (long) the row key where key exists in the table
methods.getKeyColumns: :return: (java.lang.String[]) the key columns this reverse lookup is indexed on
methods.getNoEntryValue:
Returns the value that will be returned from get(java.lang.Object) or if no entry exists for a given key.

:return: long
methods.getPrev:
Gets the row key value where key previously in the table, or the no-entry-value if it is not found in the table.

:param key: (java.lang.Object) - a single object for a single column, or a SmartKey for
        multiple columns
:return: (long) the row key where key previously existed in the table

text: For hierarchical table display, identify the row key that corresponds to a given logical key.
